title: Interpretation of tears in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of tears in a dream. Many interpreters differed regarding the meaning of seeing tears in a dream. Sadness means sadness and pain in a dream, or are they tears of joy? Commentators have agreed that the difference in interpretation of a dream is due to the dream itself, its details, and the condition of the dreamer. Therefore, in our article today, we will present the interpretation of crying in a dream. The dream, and if he was with him without screaming, how is it interpreted, or crying for a specific person? All of this is detailed in the encyclopedia, so follow us. Interpretation of tears in a dreamInterpretation of tears in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of crying in a dream according to Ibn Sirin does not differ if the dreamer is a man or a woman. In both cases, they deny the interpretation, which is: If the dreamer cries while screaming, this is evidence of a set of sorrows befalling him and great misguidance. If the crying is for a specific person, it shows your sadness and your influence on his grief. But if the crying is without screaming, then this is evidence of comfort, the nearness of comfort, and getting rid of worries and sorrows. If the crying is after a dead person or a funeral, but without screaming or wailing, then this indicates the disappearance of sorrows and the release of worries. But if the crying and wailing is accompanied by bursting the chest, slapping the cheeks, and tearing clothes, then this indicates that sadness is on its way. And if the crying is during... The Messenger reading or listening to the Qur’an, or remembering and asking for forgiveness, is a sign of joy that has spread throughout his home, his family, and his heart, and a sign of disappearance. Of sorrows and the death of sorrows. But if the vision of a dead person crying is evidence of the dead person’s need, such as paying off a debt or settling a matter, then it must be investigated. Interpretation of tears in a dream by Ibn ShaheenIbn Shaheen interpreted crying followed by laughter in a dream, because it may indicate the death of the dreamer. However, if the dreamer sees that his eyes are overflowing with tears, but these tears do not fall from his eyes, then this indicates a large amount of legitimate money on its way to him. However, if the dreamer cries over a dead person, then this indicates a calamity on the way to him. As for the one who sees himself He cries out of fear of God while listening to or reciting the Qur’an, as this indicates the dreamer’s sadness over the sin he committed and his closeness to God and the good news of the death of worry. Sadness and joy entering his heart. But if one of you sees that he is crying, and instead of crying blood comes out, this indicates deep sadness for something. But if the fortuneteller sees that a group of people have gathered crying, this indicates that the crowd will meet after a long separation. Interpretation Tears in a dream by Al-Nabulsi: If the dreamer cries in the dream, but without crying, screaming, or slapping, then this indicates the disappearance of sadness and anxiety from the dreamer. But if the dreamer cries in his dream, screaming, wailing, and slapping, then this is a sign of the calamity and great mistake that befalls the dreamer. But if the dreamer cries In his shadow while he hears the Qur’an or dhikr or the like, it is a sign of the fear of God, and good and abundant news reaches whoever sees it. Interpretation of tears in a dream for a married, single, and pregnant woman. If the girl is unmarried and sees that she is crying in her dream, but without crying or screaming, then it means A sign of her purity and chastity. If the dreamer is married but cries in her dream, this means that her life is...

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an old neighbor in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing an old neighbor in a dream, dear reader, you can learn the interpretations of seeing the neighbor and what is good and bad. Below you can learn the interpretation of the dream of seeing the old neighbor in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing an old neighbor in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing an old neighbor in a dream could indicate old problems that concern the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. Just as the dreamer sees his old neighbor, this may be embryonic evidence of the past, and God knows all that is unseen, as seeing the neighbor may indicate When a married woman sees her elderly neighbor in a dream, this may express nostalgia for the past, and God knows all that we did not see. I dreamed that I drowned with my neighbor in a dream. I dreamed that I drowned with my neighbor in a dream, which may be a sign of hatred. And God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees a quarrel with her neighbors, she may express evil, and God knows best. If a married man sees in a dream a quarrel with his neighbors, this may be evidence of a strong relationship with them, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if an unmarried girl sees a quarrel with the neighbors, it may lead to Alimony, and God knows best. I dreamed that my neighbor was isolated in a dream. I dreamed that my neighbor was isolated in a dream. We did not find specific explanations for this vision, except that seeing moving from one house to another may indicate the changes that the dreamer sees, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees moving from an old house to another house New, as this may lead to changes in work, and God knows the unseen. It can also express the vision of moving from an old house to a spacious house in a dream. It could be evidence of good changes, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a neighbor’s wife in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a neighbor’s wife in a dream. It can be a sign of relief from stress, and God knows the unseen. When a married woman sees her neighbor’s wife in a dream, this may represent good changes in material matters, and God knows all that is not seen. While seeing a neighbor’s wife for a married man may indicate obstacles and difficulties, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. An unmarried girl saw her neighbor’s wife in a dream, this may represent a promotion at work, and God has all knowledge. Interpretation of dreams of my cousin hugging me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream in which my cousin hugs me in a dream could be a sign of relief from stress, and God knows all that is not seen. If she saw a divorced woman in In a dream, her cousin hugs her, this may mean that she will get rid of problems, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Likewise, if a pregnant woman sees her cousin hugging her in a dream, this may lead to the good that she will achieve, God willing. If a single girl sees her cousin’s breasts, this may be a sign On weakness, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams about my cousin sitting next to me in a dream. title: Dream Interpretation to see a legal spell in a dream

preview.html: The dream interpretation of seeing the legal ruqyah in a dream and seeing the legal ruqyah in dreams has many important controls and indicators in our lives because the legal ruqyah is a collection of books and prophetic hadiths that aim to protect the human soul from abuse and demons, and the dream. The legal rukia vision indicates goodness, security, prevention of disease, payment of debts, happiness, family stability, and rest after fatigue. Follow us. The dream of the legal ruqyah of Ibn Sirin. The dream of the legal ruqyah and the Holy Qur’an in a dream from Ibn Sirin’s point of view shows the dreamer’s desire for money and knowledge. Dreaming of a legal talisman in a dream is evidence of freedom from stress and sadness. Dreaming of the legal ruqyah for the elderly in a dream indicates knowledge and wisdom. Wisdom in matters of life and immunity against demons. Reading the legal talisman indicates recovery from sickness, sickness, and disease. Dreaming of a legal talisman indicates a long life for the pioneer. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a legal talisman in a dream is evidence of the desire for psychological comfort. Seeing the legal ruqyah for a married woman. Seeing a married woman Reading the legal ruqyah over her husband indicates envy and hatred from some people, such as friends or neighbors. A dream about a wife’s legal ruqyah indicates anxiety, tension, and fear, but all of this will pass and their psychological and social condition will improve. If the married woman is seen reading the legal ruqyah over the boy, this indicates For her safety from his envy, jinn, and guidance. Dreaming of a legitimate ruqyah for a married woman indicates calm, tranquility, and stability in marriage. Dreaming of a legitimate ruqyah, or seeing a sheikh reading to a fortune teller, this indicates a desire to end magic. A dream of a legitimate ruqyah for a pregnant woman: seeing a pregnant woman reading a legitimate ruqyah in The dream indicates the birth of a healthy, healthy child. The legitimate dream of Rukia in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the ease and comfort of childbirth. Seeing the legitimate ruqyah for a man. Seeing the legal ruqyah in a man’s dream means that he will acquire wealth and obtain a prestigious job. The legitimate vision for a man means comfort after fatigue, safety and reassurance. Read The legal ruqyah in a dream indicates obtaining a distinguished job, abundant livelihood, and many goods. If an unmarried girl sees herself promoting someone in a dream, this indicates the knowledge and wisdom that she possesses, and it also shows the girl’s calm and serenity. Seeing the legal ruqyah in Al-Fatihah indicates It indicates a lot of goodness for the pioneer, success and blessing in the life of the dreamer. It also indicates the longevity of the dreamer and his protection from envy, magic and sin. And whoever sees that he is ruqyah for someone else, this indicates the knowledge and understanding of the dreamer. Seeing the ruqyah of others indicates comfort, tranquility and stability. Seeing the legal ruqyah for the divorced woman. Seeing the ruqyah of others indicates comfort, tranquility and stability. A sheikh screaming indicates a collapse in stress and fatigue. You see yourself going to an old man performing ruqyah, this indicates relief after fatigue. Seeing a sheikh who has been promoted and has a good reputation is a promising vision of reassurance and psychological peace. See the legal ruqyah

title: Interpretation of a dream about a husband having sex with his wife in front of his family in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a husband who cohabitates with his wife in front of his family in a dream. The vision of sexual intercourse carries meanings of good and evil, so we present in the following lines the interpretation of a dream about a husband who cohabitates with a woman in front of his family in a dream.. Interpretation of a dream about a husband having sex with his wife in front of his family in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that The husband has intercourse with his wife in front of his family. In a dream, intercourse in front of people can be a sign of love, and God knows all that is not seen. If the dreamer sees intercourse in front of people in a dream, this may indicate good behavior, and God knows best. When you see intercourse in front of people in a dream, it can be a sign of love, and God knows all. What is not seen: If a married woman sees in a dream having intercourse in front of people, this may indicate the friendship that unites them, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of cohabitation with her husband in the bathroom in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of cohabitation with her husband in the bathroom in a dream could indicate stability, God willing. If the dreamer sees himself cohabiting with his husband in A bathroom in a dream, this may mean that he will be freed from sadness, God willing. When a married woman sees her husband having sex with her in the bathroom in a dream, this may represent getting rid of problems, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Likewise, having sex in the bathroom can lead to the rejection of the person who harms both spouses. And God knows everything that is not seen. I dreamed that my husband had sex with me while I was menstruating in a dream. I dreamed that my husband had sex with me while I was menstruating in a dream, and seeing intercourse during my menstrual cycle could indicate an urgent need for care, and God knows all the unseen. If a married woman sees That her husband is having intercourse with her during her menstrual period, this may be evidence of travel, and God knows best. Seeing intercourse during the menstrual cycle could indicate recklessness in making decisions, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees intercourse during the period, it could lead to an urgent need for nourishment, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about living with The genie in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about living with a genie in a dream can lead to turning away from God, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees himself living with a genie in a dream, this may indicate the need to turn away from sins, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married woman sees sexual intercourse in a dream Jeans, this may be a sign that she is far from the path of truth, and God knows the unseen. When we see an association with jinn, it may indicate shortcomings in religion, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a man harassing a man in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a man harassing a man in a dream could be evidence of the actions that he performs. And God is Most High and Most Knowing. Where a vision of a man harassing him expresses illegal actions, and God knows all that is unseen. The interpretation of seeing cats in a dream indicates the loss of a livelihood and bad luck. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a cat in a dream Interpretation of a dream about a black cat The interpretation of a dream about black cats for black women indicates the presence of a cunning person who deceives them in the name of love or in the name of friendship. The interpretation of seeing black cats in a dream for a girl is evidence that a bad person will enter her life and that she will be associated with him and cause her problems. Seeing the tail of a black cat in a dream for a girl is a sign of good luck in a romantic relationship. The interpretation of a dream about cats for elderly women is evidence that in reality the closest people around them will betray them. And the interpretation of seeing a black cat in a dream for a married woman in a dream is evidence that seeing black cats in a dream is really undesirable, because it always shows the approach of betrayal, deception, friends and smart people. Interpretation of a dream about white cats in a dream for a married woman is evidence that she is a woman interested in raising her children in a good way and wants to teach them values ​​and good morals. Interpretation of a dream about cats in a dream for a married woman is evidence of a major crisis. title: Interpretation of a dream about the Kaaba by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the Kaaba Seeing the Kaaba is a big dream for most people, so we find that most of them want to go to the Kaaba to perform the Hajj or Umrah. Their hearts are reassured, so follow us to provide you with anything related to the interpretation of seeing the Kaaba in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of the KaabaIn the interpretation of the dream of the Kaaba in a dream, the following: Seeing the Kaaba in a dream indicates his closeness to God Almighty and his continuity in duties, Sunnah and religious rituals, and it also indicates the dreamer's distinction with many good deeds. Ibn Sirin says that the dream of the Kaaba in a dream is one of the good visions that indicate the abundance of legitimate livelihood, striving and tenderness for people to the dreamer and showing generosity, giving and abundance of blessings. Seeing the Kaaba in a dream symbolizes the pursuit of reaching a great position after a period of diligence and fatigue. The vision may also indicate the marriage of one of the dreamer's relatives, either his sister or daughter, and that he is a righteous man. Interpretation of the dream of the Kaaba by Ibn SirinSeeing the Kaaba in a dream carries many important interpretations for Ibn Sirin, so we will present some of these interpretations that we obtained from him:Whoever sees the Kaaba in his dream, the vision symbolizes the achievement of high goals and the fulfillment of all his desires. Seeing the Kaaba in a place Different and the sky is black in color, an unpleasant vision that indicates a disaster and destruction in the country. Interpretation of a dream about the Kaaba for a single woman The great scholar Al-Nabulsi told us about the interpretation of seeing the Kaaba in a dream for an unmarried woman, indicating God’s response to fulfilling all the desires that she continued to pray to God. Seeing an unmarried woman entering the Kaaba indicates her close marriage to a righteous person who knows God and treats her well. Seeing the dreamer participating in covering the Kaaba indicates that she is a pure girl, characterized by good morals and a good reputation. Seeing the Kaaba in the dreamer’s house is evidence of the dreamer’s good reputation, good morals, and calm feelings. Al-Nabulsi narrated in the interpretation that she sees herself standing in front of the Kaaba in a dream as evidence that she has reached a great position in her professional life and is trying to satisfy her desires. Ibn Shaheen says that seeing the dreamer inside the Kaaba and drinking Zamzam water in a dream is evidence that he has reached a great position that he was trying to reach. Interpretation of a dream about the Holy Kaaba for a married woman Seeing the Kaaba in a dream for a married woman who has not given birth is evidence that she will soon become pregnant, God willing, and that God will fulfill all Desires that she sought to achieve. If a married woman sees the cover of the Kaaba in her dream, the vision indicates that she will receive many blessings, lawful food and benefits. If a woman sees that her husband is the one touching the Kaaba, the vision symbolizes that she will get a promotion in his job. Interpretation of the dream of the Kaaba for a pregnant woman A pregnant woman who sees in her dream that she is praying in the Kaaba is evidence that God will grant her a righteous and healthy child who will be a righteous son with his family. If a pregnant woman sees the Kaaba in her dream, this indicates the lawful prediction of the arrival of the child, who will reach a great position and status.

title: Meanings of interpretation of a dream about ants in the house by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about ants in the house: Ants are considered insects that are hated in ordinary life, and seeing them in a person’s dream has many meanings and connotations, some of which lead to good news and others that bring with them negative events and misfortunes. The dream of ants in this article.Interpretation of the dream of ants in the house.Interpretation of the dream of ants in the house as they wander right and left on the dreamer’s bed, without feeling uncomfortable, indicates that God will bless him with many children in the near future.When a person sees in his dream that ants enter his house And he has grains of rice, this means that he is making his living from a lawful source after hardship and hardship. If someone sees in a dream that ants are in his house and talking to him, then this dream is very promising and indicates his high status and his reaching prestigious places in his work or in society in general. When he saw an infinite number of ants in someone's dream and was shocked, he concluded that he was getting his share of the property of one of his deceased relatives, thus raising his standard of living. If you dream of ants entering someone's kitchen and taking a lot of his food, this is a sign that in the days Next, he will go through a difficult period of financial distress, lack of resources, and lack of livelihood. If the dreamer sees in his dream that ants entered the kitchen and took all his food, he will lose all his wealth. Interpretation of a dream about ants in the house by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained many of the meanings associated with ants in the house in a dream. The most important of them are: If the fortuneteller is a merchant and suffers from depression and lack of profit and sees ants all over his shop, he will win the deals he manages and make huge financial gains from them soon. If the person suffers from dengue fever and sees in his dream that ants surround him and sting his body without Pain, God will enrich him from His bounty and he will be among the rich in the coming season. Dreaming of seeing termites in the house and eating them in your dream indicates gaining blessings and gifts, expanding one’s scope of living and a comfortable life without disturbances with his family. Whoever sees himself in a dream sleeping in his room and sees ants Coming out of his hair expresses his pessimism and does not see hope for tomorrow, which leads to frustration, feelings of anxiety, and falling prey to psychological disorders. Seeing ants flying in a person’s room in a dream is undesirable and symbolizes his approaching death in the coming days. Interpretation of a dream about ants in the house for non-women Married women: If the dreamer is single and sees a large number of ants in her dream, this is clear evidence that she is diligent and loves science. She will achieve overwhelming success in the scientific aspect and will reach the college that she hoped to enter in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about the presence of ants all over the room for a girl who has never been married before. With a feeling of fear and anxiety. The Virgin sees ants and stuffing her clothes in a dream, and this is evidence of the lack of resources and the distress of life that she suffers from. Interpretation of a dream about ants in the house for a married woman If the dreamer is married and does not have children, and she sees ants in her house in her dream, then God will grant her a large number of Good offspring

title: Interpretation of a dream about sign language

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing sign language in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that seeing sign language or teaching the language in a dream can herald good and happy news, and God knows best. Seeing teaching sign language in a dream also indicates the long life of the pioneer and the elimination of worries and disagreements. Facilitating the situation for the better. Also, seeing sign language in a dream can indicate tact, good treatment, honesty in all matters, and not doing anything wrong. Interpretation of seeing sign language in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl dreams that she sees and learns sign language, this indicates the collapse of fears The unmarried woman and happiness in her life. Also, seeing sign language in a dream can indicate many benefits, livelihoods, and the presence of people who do not wish her well in reality. Also, dreaming of teaching sign language may indicate the good intentions of an unmarried girl and her close marriage to a good man, by God. I know. When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she sees sign language, this indicates excellence and success in her coming life, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing sign language in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees sign language or teaching in her dreams, this indicates the collapse of disputes, worries, and sorrows and the alleviation of The anguish of her husband. Seeing sign language in a married woman’s dream may indicate that the woman keeps the secrets of her home and that she is an obedient person to God and to her husband in his affairs. Also, seeing and teaching sign language in a dream can indicate the good that the woman will achieve in her life, as well as happiness. Interpretation of seeing sign language in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees sign language in her dream, this indicates the collapse of her worries, as well as calming her affairs, and stopping the pain of the imminent pregnancy. Also, seeing sign language in a dream indicates good news and praiseworthy matters, and the approaching date of her birth and his birth will be An easy matter. Interpretation of seeing sign language in a dream for a man. If a compassionate man dreams that he is teaching sign language to children in a dream, this indicates the collapse of his worries and his joining a new job. Also, seeing sign language in a dream can indicate the marriage of a nice man, good intentions, And achieving goals, and contracting a close marriage. This vision may also indicate the end of disputes between him and his wife, and it may also indicate sincerity, interpretation, and glorification, and God knows best. Seeing training in sign language in a dream indicates the abundance of livelihoods and charitable works carried out by the dreamer, As well as abundant profits in trade. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing childbirth in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about childbirth in a dream We present to you on the Mohazat website everything that is new and distinctive in our article Seeing childbirth in a dream is a siren line. To learn more about the interpretation of dreams on our website, all the news, interpretation of dreams on the Mohazat website. Interpretation of childbirth in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Sirin indicated in his interpretation Until seeing childbirth in a dream indicates the generality of offspring, so whoever sees in a dream that his wife gave birth to him is clear, but in reality he is not pregnant, this indicates a treasure for the owner. Insight. Read also: Interpretation of seeing long hair in a dream. Interpretation of childbirth in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is giving birth, this indicates fun activities, and perhaps this insight indicates a serious romantic crisis. Interpretation of childbirth in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams That she gave birth to a female, it means good news and happy events. A male in a married woman’s dream indicates major marital disputes that may lead to divorce. Interpretation of childbirth in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she has given birth and given birth to a female, this means that she will give birth to a cleaner child, and this indicates a smooth and easy natural birth, but if she sees that she She was born in pain. And pains. This indicates that she underwent a soft birth process that entailed a lot of pain and problems.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a peacock in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a peacock in a dream, and a peacock in a dream shows wealth and wealth and shows marriage to a beautiful woman because it shows marriage, family stability, and achieving happiness. A peacock in a dream indicates the fulfillment of desires and wealth, as it indicates a girl’s marriage to a rich and handsome man, and a young man indicates his marriage to a beautiful girl. The dream of seeing a peacock by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a male peacock in a dream, and he said: Seeing a peacock indicates a beautiful and sexy woman. Seeing a peacock in a dream symbolizes a pimp. Seeing a peacock in a dream also indicates laughter and enjoyment. Dream of seeing a peacock for a single woman. Seeing a peacock in your dream is a symbol of good luck in love and work. Seeing a peacock in a dream indicates a healthy choice in the life of a single woman. Seeing one peacock At home, it means that she will marry a rich and handsome man. Seeing a peacock for an unmarried woman indicates a happy marriage and a good life. Dreaming of seeing a peacock for a married woman. Seeing a peacock in a married woman’s dream indicates a decent life. Also, a peacock in a married woman’s dream indicates the extent of stability, whether In a psychological or emotional state. Seeing a married woman playing with a peacock means good news. A peacock in a married woman’s dream indicates success in her life. Dream of seeing a peacock for a pregnant woman. If you see a peacock in a dream for a pregnant woman, it means that she will give birth to a child. Seeing a peacock in a woman’s dream A pregnant woman indicates a bright future and an improvement in her social circumstances. Seeing a peacock for a pregnant woman in a dream indicates the birth of a male child, which is good for her. A peacock for a pregnant woman in a dream is evidence of recovery from diseases, facilitation of childbirth, and the health of the newborn. A dream of seeing a peacock for a man. Seeing a peacock in a man’s dream indicates Achieving goals. Seeing a black or blue peacock in a dream indicates the coming of sorrows. Seeing a peacock in a dream indicates good luck. Seeing a yellow peacock in a dream means illness and fatigue. Seeing a peacock chasing shows strength and prestige. Seeing peacock eggs in a dream means money, blessings, and livelihood. Dream of seeing a colored peacock. A peacock means well-being and wealth. It also indicates good luck and prosperity. It may indicate vanity, conceit, and conceit. A black or yellow peacock can indicate stress and anxiety. It can indicate failure and illness. A colored peacock means genius, ingenuity and the fulfillment of desires. If she sees If a girl has a peacock, this indicates her marriage to a rich man. And if she sees that he is moving away from the peacock, this indicates that he will do some work, but he is hesitant and afraid. Seeing a peacock in a dream for a pregnant woman shows a lot of goodness and hope. And for easy childbirth, as well as for the birth of a beautiful son. It is It indicates the fulfillment of the desires and dreams of a pregnant woman. Seeing a woman and her husband feeding a peacock is good and indicates a friendly and loving relationship between them and the cessation of problems and quarrels. Seeing one peacock in a dream is a good dream. In a dream, this indicates a girl’s involvement with a wealthy person and the fulfillment of her desires. A dream of seeing a peacock for a woman Divorced: The dream of a divorced woman indicates
